kiMultiplier: 12 Ki Multiplier is 150%; 24 Ki Multiplier is 200%; SA Lv.20 raises SA Multiplier by an additional 30%

name: Super Saiyan 2 Vegeta (Angel)

passive: ATK & DEF +70%; plus an additional ATK & DEF +4% each time Ki rises by 1 (up to 70%); Ki +3 when the name of an ally who is attacking in the same turn or an enemy includes "Goku" (Youth, Captain Ginyu, Jr., etc. excluded); plus an additional Ki +3 when there is a "Majin Buu Saga" Category ally whose name includes "Goku" attacking in the same turn

activeSkillCondition: Can be activated when there is a "Majin Buu Saga" Category ally whose name includes "Goku" attacking in the same turn, starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle (once only)
